https://tmrev.io/movie/39798-Bashing 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/46L4jESVZPPmvhNOj4DqQ11U0Jt.jpg Yuko is a Japanese girl who was taken hostage in Iraq while volunteering there as an aid worker. Finally released and back in her hometown, Yuko finds herself ostracized as a national disgrace by society that sees her helping a country other than Japan, and the embarrassment of getting captured but not killed, as things of which to be brutally ashamed. Bashing
